Kumquat is a culinary android application. The project was started as an idea from our Software Design and Documentation class.

The features of Kumquat are:
 ▫ Store an inventory of items currently available
 ▫ Display a list of recipes based off a specific item
 ▫ Generate a random recipe
 ▫ Add items to the shopping list based off a recipe ingredients and the inventory
 ▫ Generate cookable recipes based of the inventory
